summary: The Lich Kings Armor - Bombshell Cleavage BBP by furiousreason for the UNP Skinny body
descriptionHtml:
You need:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6348/?]Frostmourne and Lich Kings Armor by jojjo[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49171/?]Lich Kings Armor - Bombshell Cleavage BBP by furiousreason[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url]


Installation:

First install the File "Lich Kings Armor 0_991" from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6348/?]Frostmourne and Lich Kings Armor by jojjo[/url] then install Lich Kings Armor - Bombshell from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49171/?]Lich Kings Armor - Bombshell Cleavage BBP by furiousreason[/url] and then use my meshes to get the UNP Skinny version.



Remember to Endrose the two orginal files too, if you like this one!



Credits
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/537675/?]_Dimon[/url] - for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP meshes [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/545784/?]_jojjo[/url] - for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6348/?]Frostmourne and Lich Kings Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4242160/?]_furiousreason[/url] - for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49171/?]Lich Kings Armor - Bombshell Cleavage BBP[/url]
author: BadDragonLord
